text: The Farmer Takes a Wife is a 1953 American musical comedy movie. It was directed by Henry Levin. The movie and is based on 1934 play of the same name. It is a remake of the 1935 original. Actors include Betty Grable, Dale Robertson, Thelma Ritter, John Carroll, and Merry Anders. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1953 musical movies Category:1953 comedy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies set on farms Category:Movies about farmers Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Henry Levin
title: The Farmer Takes a Wife (1953 movie)
